ygData.messageBody:
--- kim@... wrote:
> On Mon, 27 Mar 2000, Bill Costlow wrote:

> > LOL! ...and if I had a dollar for every time I
> waited
> > to be healed and died, I could buy Verant;-)

> Best remedies for when this type of stupidity
> happens is to
> root or stun the mob. Then give the running player
> a severe
> tongue-lashing afterwards.

Hmmmm. Did I say I run? I merely said that if I had
a dollar for every time I waited to be healed...

No. what I try to do is slap on accelerondo and
circle the battle. I stay within spell range, avoid
the mobs and keep my party a little faster on their
feet. If things go well I can bellow for some minor
damage. Little trick from playing quake2.

Personally though, I've found it pretty tough for a
14th lvl bard to root or stun three dervishes at once.
If you're going to tell me the party should do that,
please go back and read my initial words: "If I had a
dollar for every time I waited..."

Peace

Tyunes
Bard of the unpurchased 14th Song
Rodcet Nife
